2:[Reserved]
3:[Reserved]
4: Enable LODIST calibration

6: [Reserved]

rlUInt32_t periodicCalibEnMask
 Automatic periodic triggering of calibrations of various RF/analog aspects.
It has same bit definition as above
.
 
rlUInt32_t calibPeriodicity
 1 LSB = 1 CALIB_MON_TIME_UNIT, as specified in RL_RF_CALIB_MON_TIME_UNIT_SB.
 
rlUInt8_t reportEn
 Calibration Report Enable Configuration
[b0] Enable Calibration Reports Bitmap
0 - Disable Calibration Reports
1 - Enable Calibration Reports
[b7:1] Reserved
.
 
rlUInt8_t reserved0
 Reserved for Future use.
 
rlUInt16_t txPowerCalMode
 TX Power Calibration Mode [b0] Enable Calibration Reports Bitmap
0 - Update TX gain setting from LUT and do a closed loop calibration (OLPC + CLPC)
1 - Update TX gain settings from LUT only (OLPC only)
[b15:1] Reserved
.
 
rlUInt32_t reserved1
 Reserved for Future use.
